bike.description: C4 carbon w/ integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: C4 carbon thin seat stays, oversized chainstays, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Rotor Press-Fit BB86/30 sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano Ultegra Di2 Electronic STI shifter/brake, 20-speed, Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia XR w/ FeC alloy rails
